member.name: T:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient
member.summary: Client class used to interact with the API.

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.#ctor(Wizemen.NET.Models.Credentials)
member.summary: Creates a client used to interact with the API
member.param: The credentials object with the user's credentials

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.StartAsync
member.summary: Login, generate a cookie, and verify the cookie to enable access to the API.
member.exception: Thrown if the credentials provided were invalid

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.GetMeetingsAsync(Wizemen.NET.Models.MeetingType)
member.summary: Gets the meetings for the authenticated user
member.param: The type of meeting to get
member.returns: The meetings found. Returns an empty list if none were found

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.GetClassesAsync
member.summary: Gets the classes of the authenticated user
member.returns: The classes found. Returns an empty list if none were found

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.GetClassListAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all the students in a class
member.param: The classId to get the students in
member.returns: A list of the students found. Returns an empty list if none were found (invalid classId)

member.name: M:Wizemen.NET.WizemenClient.GetEventsAsync
member.summary: Gets the events of the authenticated user
member.returns: The events found. Returns an empty list if none were found
